Text.Page:
We've detected some alarming magical energy from the northeast quadrant of the third level. Frankly, it seems beyond anything the nagas can do. I suspect the mekonaris.

Specifically, I suspect the {@LinkCreature:42#910#mekonari witches}. They're smart.

Killing enough of them may throw a wrench into whatever they're planning. We can hope so, at least.

I still don't get it. Okay, magical energy. Lots of it. How does that equal bringing back a dead serpent god?

Well, we did the best thing. Thanks, .
